ticket.title: Store Locator > Running Expert stores do not appear in search for "All"
ticket.original-body:
All should return all results including Running Expert Stores.
I added the Running Expert store data for DE.
Compare: http://www.de.asics2-draft.theplant-dev.com/store_locator/?zip=berlin&category_id=&store_type=all
and: http://www.de.asics2-draft.theplant-dev.com/store_locator/?zip=berlin&category_id=&store_type=expert_running

and: http://www.de.asics2-draft.theplant-dev.com/store_locator/?zip=berlin&category_id=&store_type=expert_running

version.body:
All should return all results including Running Expert Stores.
I added the Running Expert store data for DE.
Compare: http://www.de.asics2-draft.theplant-dev.com/store_locator/?zip=berlin&category_id=&store_type=all
and: http://www.de.asics2-draft.theplant-dev.com/store_locator/?zip=berlin&category_id=&store_type=expert_running
version.body-html:
All should return all results including Running Expert Stores.

I added the Running Expert store data for DE.

Compare: http://www.de.asics2-draft.theplant-dev.com/store_locator/?zip=berl...

and: http://www.de.asics2-draft.theplant-dev.com/store_locator/?zip=berl...
version.title: Store Locator > Running Expert stores do not appear in search for "All"

version.body:
Hi,
The first one, search conditions: address = Berlin, radius = 4.5km, store_type = all but, distance between stores ("Long Distance", "Lang und Laufladen") and center point > 4.5km, so the Running Expert Stores don't display.
The second one, we will search by (address = Berlin, radius = 4.5km, store_type = running_expert) first, but we can't any stores. so system will enlarge the radius to 10km, and find the stores (Long Distance), (Lang und Laufladen). There is why the Running Expert stores display in the second one.
version.body-html:
Hi,

The first one, search conditions:
address = Berlin, radius = 4.5km, store_type = all
but, distance between stores ("Long Distance", "Lang und Laufladen") and center point > 4.5km, so the Running Expert Stores don't display.

The second one, we will search by (address = Berlin, radius = 4.5km, store_type = running_expert) first, but we can't any stores. so system will enlarge the radius to 10km, and find the stores (Long Distance), (Lang und Laufladen). There is why the Running Expert stores display in the second one.
version.title: Store Locator > Running Expert stores do not appear in search for "All"

version.body: Thanks for the explanation. Could you tell me how the radius 4.5 km is decided?
version.body-html:
Thanks for the explanation. Could you tell me how the radius 4.5 km is
decided?
